mapper.sql: id, wntid, wnlid, work_state, yuliu1, yuliu2
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( wnlid ) FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal WHERE wntid =#{id}

SELECT aww.id, awt.worknamesall, awl.workname, aww.work_state FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal awt, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary awl, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal aww WHERE awt.id = aww.wntid AND awl.id = aww.wnlid AND awl.workname LIKE concat('%',#{workname},'%')

SELECT aww.id, awt.worknamesall, awl.workname, aww.work_state FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal awt, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary awl, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal aww WHERE awt.id = aww.wntid AND awl.id = aww.wnlid AND awt.id =#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal
id,
wntid,
wnlid,
work_state,
yuliu1,
yuliu2,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{wntid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{wnlid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{workState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{yuliu1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{yuliu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal
wntid = #{wntid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wnlid = #{wnlid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
work_state = #{workState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yuliu1 = #{yuliu1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yuliu2 = #{yuliu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal set wntid = #{wntid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wnlid = #{wnlid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_state = #{workState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yuliu1 = #{yuliu1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yuliu2 = #{yuliu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
